name: Annoying game
description:
Hi! Not sure if this game will work at all but I tried. 

You have 3 lives,  sawblades are trying to cut your ass, and in order to escape this hell you have to collect 9 strawberries.  No invincibility frames! Sawblades might one shot you!!!  WOW!!!

Disclaimer: Turn your volume down before opening.  

Credits:

Art - Free assets from Unity asset store, Pixel Adventure 1

Music - I Haven't Been To The Dentist Since The 90's by Elvis Herod
